entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Refers to non-magical people. Mentioned as having noticed something's going on.

entities.name: news
entities.description: Mentioned as a source of information for the Muggles.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Refers to Harry Potter's cruel and neglectful relatives. Mentioned as having a dark living-room window.

entities.name: dedalus diggle
entities.description: Mentioned as being responsible for shooting stars in Kent.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Mentioned as speaking gently and not wanting to blame the Muggles.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Mentioned as being irritated and blaming people for being careless.

entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: Mentioned as an event that would be a fine thing if it happened on the same day.

relationships.description: The Muggles have noticed something's going on through the news.
Dumbledore is trying to reassure Professor McGonagall that it's not their fault.
